title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. J, pt. 135 - Restricted Use License
content:

§ 135.3 - Action to be taken by court

§ 135.5 - Procedure to be followed by motorist who receives notice of revocation or suspension
§ 135.6 - Waiver required

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. J, pt. 135

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215, 510[6], 530, 1196

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
